overview: Anti-narrative experimental film, “1998” was filmed from Feb. through OCT. 1998. In different locations(Beriln, Paris, Daegu, Oksan) and out of the filmed reel, 15 short films were edited and screened at 16 frame/sec and 9 sec. at 24 frame/sec). The film mostly about family, family related places, unfamiliar sceneries that were seen while taking a walk with a friend, scenes of my hometown, Daegu, airport and streets of Paris while transiting a flight to Korea life of Berlin.
